content.text:
Here is my attempt at the task, following the specified output format:

Referring Unresolved Customer Grievances

1. Review the customer grievance thoroughly to understand the issue 2. Determine which department is best suited to investigate and resolve the grievance based on the nature of the complaint 3. Compile all relevant case details and customer information 4. Submit a referral to the appropriate department, clearly outlining the issue and required actions 5. Notify the customer that their case has been escalated and provide them with the contact information of the department handling their grievance 6. Follow up with the assigned department to ensure the grievance is being investigated and resolved in a timely manner 7. Update the customer on the resolution status and outcome once the investigation is complete
